title: Is the officer mamaluke sword or the NCO sword sharp? - Quora

response.answer_text: We're going to go with no. The swords used in ceremonies are always intentionally non edged swords; less likelihood of ouchies that way. A few companies do make sharpened forms of these blades however, and can be purchased online. However, youd never be able to use it for it's intended purpose; to look clean as hell during ceremonies. Hope this clears some stuff up for you!
